Looking forward to your pr.

yes, using signal can cause threads to block until a timeout in some scenarios

please resolve conflicts.

If it is not convenient to upgrade the version, you can't use the latest code. According to the bug of its code, you can "bug the bug"
According to the dev documentation, in the META-INF folder, after the value of META-INF/dubbo/com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.ExporterListener is xxx=com.xxx.XxxExporterListener, the startup will throw a mistake and cannot be started.
According to the code bug, the problem is the problem posted by @kinglcc. The reason for the error is that there is no InvokerListener, then the processing method is as follows
1. The current XxxExporterListener implements the InvokerListener interface at the same time, and the method implementation of the InvokerListener is left blank.
2. META-INF/dubbo/com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.InvokerListener, the value is xxx=com.xxx.XxxExporterListener
This way, you can use the convenience of the ExporterListener without upgrading the framework. 

如果不方便升级版本，无法使用最新的代码，根据它的代码的bug，可以 "将bug就bug“
按照dev文档，在META-INF文件夹内配置好，META-INF/dubbo/com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.ExporterListener的值为xxx=com.xxx.XxxExporterListener之后，启动会抛错，无法启动。
根据代码bug来看，问题就是 @kinglcc 贴出的问题。错误原因是，不存在InvokerListener，那么处理方法如下
1. 当前的XxxExporterListener同时实现InvokerListener接口，InvokerListener的方法实现留空。
2. META-INF/dubbo/com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.InvokerListener，值为xxx=com.xxx.XxxExporterListener
这样子，就可以在不升级框架的情况下，来使用ExporterListener带来的便利。

这个修改有问题, 原来的代码是正确的.

在 `DubboAutoConfiguration` 中, 有两个类 `SingleDubboConfigConfiguration`, `MultipleDubboConfigConfiguration`

当 `dubbo.config.multiple = true`, 这两个类都会被被当做 `configuration class` 引入

因为这两个类上都有 `@EnableDubboConfig` 注解, 而这个注解里有 `@Import(DubboConfigConfigurationRegistrar.class)
`, 这个 `DubboConfigConfigurationRegistrar` 实现了 `ImportBeanDefinitionRegistrar`

所以这两个 `configuration class` 引入时, 都会执行一遍 `DubboConfigConfigurationRegistrar.registerBeanDefinitions()`, 不同点是 
这两个注解的 `attributes.getBoolean("multiple")` 不同.

正好在原 `DubboConfigConfigurationRegistrar.registerBeanDefinitions()` 的实现中
```
if (multiple) {
    registerBeans(registry, DubboConfigConfiguration.Multiple.class);
} else {
    registerBeans(registry, DubboConfigConfiguration.Single.class);
}
```

两次执行, 分别加载 `DubboConfigConfiguration.Multiple.class` 和 ` DubboConfigConfiguration.Single.class`.

而在修改后, `DubboConfigConfiguration.Multiple.class` 和 ` DubboConfigConfiguration.Single.class` 每次都会加载一遍. 

这造成的 spring 容器里 bean definetion 的覆盖. 默认是不允许的, 只有设置
```
spring:
  main:
    allow-bean-definition-overriding: true
```

才行.

这次修改应该 revert
Thanks for your advice, It does not matter, please take a look at https://github.com/apache/incubator-dubbo-spring-boot-project/issues/467.

`spring.main.allow-bean-definition-overriding` 可以用来检测配置中的潜在问题.

dubbo 作为一个接入 spring 的一个组件, 更改了 spring 的全局配置, 看上去也不是很合适.

原来的实现并没有问题, 还是建议 revert.
I think hessian-lite should publish a new version, and Dubbo should upgrade the version.

However, We can't prevent this problem even if revert. Considering this scenario: if an application annotated `@EnableDubboConfig(multiple=true)` twice and  `@EnableDubboConfig(multiple=false)` once, `DubboConfigConfiguration.Multiple` still will be registered two times, thus the natural reason is  Spring Boot 2.1 changing the default behavior of bean definition, it's to gild the lily. Please see the attribute `allowBeanDefinitionOverriding` in `org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultListableBeanFactory`, whose default value is `true`.
It is a good discussion, I will change the implementation in Dubbo 2.7.2 and 2.6.7.

For async, it's reasonable to remove it from <dubbo:service/>. But, are we going to remove timeout and retries also? Provider should be clear about the timeout and idempotency, then consumer. For these two keys should be kept, provider should have default values for consumer.
